title: Progress or status notice on EmailComposeTask
body: There is currently no way to know if an EmailComposeTask was cancelled or got an error while sending.  I need to be able to tell if the user actually went through with the email to know whether to delete the email text.  Otherwise I have to ask the user if they sent it (poor user experience).

comments.body:
...or has been sent successfully. :-)
It would be great to have somekind of a status code returned let's say through a "Completed" event.
